title: katrinastar
author: katrinastar
content: Hello,For sale: a 5-year-old cryptocurrency exchange ready to generate income immediately after liquidity placement. Over 5k registered traders. No document formalities required; the exchange can be purchased with USDT. Willing to work through an escrow service, and the project transfer and payment can be split into stages.Functionality: 2FA, faucets, manual withdrawal moderation, direct deals, a proprietary token, presence on various forums (including Twitter and Telegram channels), an internal ticket-based customer support system, user feedback collection through ticketing, internal chat for traders. The engine has undergone multiple security audits and has never been hacked. Blockchains: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance, Terra. Consultation for 3 months after the sale.We can deploy it on your servers or provide access to ours. Everything is sold, including the domain and access to all social networks and support channels on Telegram and email, access to wallets. Price is negotiable. Direct deal, no intermediaries. Feel free to ask your questions in private messages.
